citeinfo.title: To the right honourable Charles, Earl of Peterborow and Monmouth, &c this map of Africa ... is most humbly dedicated / by your Lordship's humble servant H: Moll geographer.
citeinfo.othercit:
Scale [ca. 1:16,300,000]. 1 map : hand col. ; 56 x 94 cm.
Relief shown pictorially. Shows portion of Brazil. Prime meridians: London and Ferro. "According to the newest and most exact observations." "Printed for H. Moll over against Devereux Court without Temple Bar, D. Midwinter at the 3 Crowns in St. Pauls church yard and Tho. Bowles print and mapseller next to the chapter house in St. Pauls church yard ... " Includes views of "Cape Coast Castle on ye gold coast of Guinea," "James Fort on the island of St. Helena," and "A prospect of the Cape of Good Hope," and a plan of the Fort of Good Hope.

descript.abstract: This is a scanned map of Africa from the Historical Map Collection of Princeton University's Rare Books department.
descript.purpose: The purpose is to view the map in digital format.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 2000 Version 5.0 (Build 2195) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.0.0.535

procstep.procdesc: This map was scanned with a Chroma Tx 40 Plus Wide Format color scanner and WIDEimage 2.8 software at 400 DPI in 24-bit color. The image was then reduced to 256 colors and saved in a TIFF file format. Later the TIFF image was compressed by the Mapping Science GeoJP2 software version 1.04.02. The compression ratio was 10:1.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
